text: 14:17 Onger Akaba 147:8; Jeremaia 5:24; 14:22; Aposel 17:27; Rom 1:20Egha a ian modozir puvatɨ, eghtɨ gumazamiziba a gɨfoghan kogham. Puvatɨ. A zuraram arazir aghuibar ia gamua, amozim ia ganɨga, dagher aghuir avɨriba ia ganɨga, dagher aghuibagh ami da otifi. Egha ia gamima ian naviba deragha bar akonge.”
